property.name: os
property.label: Operating System
property.description: Operating system the host runs

property.name: connectionType
property.description: Type of CIFS connection to create

property.name: address
property.description: Address of the host

property.name: port
property.description: Port on which the Telnet or WinRM server runs

property.name: username
property.description: Username to connect with

property.name: password
property.description: Password to use for authentication

property.name: cifsPort
property.label: CIFS Port
property.description: Port on which the CIFS server runs

property.name: pathShareMappings
property.label: Windows path to Windows share mappings
property.description: Mapping from Windows paths to Windows share names, e.g. C:\IBM\WebSphere -> WebSphereShare

property.name: winrmEnableHttps
property.label: Enable HTTPS for WinRM
property.description: Enable SSL communication to the WinRM server

property.name: winrsAllowDelegate
property.label: Allow credential delegation
property.description: Specifies that the user's credentials can be used to access a remote share, for example, found on a different machine than the target endpoint (WINRM_NATIVE only)

property.name: winrsProxy
property.description: Host on which to run the winrs command. Defaults to localhost. (WINRM_NATIVE only)

property.name: temporaryDirectoryPath
property.description: The default platform value (/tmp) suffices as no temporary files will be placed on the jumpstation
